Directions: Place the peppers, onion and zucchini in a greased 1-qt. baking dish; drizzle with 1 tablespoon oil and toss to coat. in a skillet, brown chicken in remaining oil; place over vegetables. Top with garlic and rosemary. Bake, uncovered, at 400 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until meat juices run clear.
Ingredients: 1 small zucchini, halved and sliced 1/2-inch thick
2 tablespoons olive or vegetable oil, divided
